attributes.action: Pay rise for all hospital staff & carers in line with other public Sector Rises
attributes.additional_details: This has been the most testing time in any health care professionals career, nurses, HCA, prorters, caterers etc all continues to work throughout the pandemic of covid 19, risking not only their lives but some their relatives whilst being selfless enough to try and save other people lives and some sadly lost their lives. These people deserve the same respect that teachers and police and other public sectors are now receiving with the governments show of appreciation by giving them a pay rise.
attributes.background: Give Hospital staff, Nurses, Allied health professionals, and support staff new pay rises to appreciate their efforts throughout the covid pandemic, in line with other public sector planned pay rises Announced July 2020
